summary: Iteration 54 - Bug Fix Verification. All 5 reported issues have been fixed and verified: 1) AI Paper page loads correctly, 2) Class 6 सामाजिक विज्ञान shows Hindi chapters (क्या, कब, कहाँ और कैसे? etc.), 3) Exam Name input works without crash/redirect, 4) Dashboard shows real data with empty state for Recent Activity, 5) Answer Key has page-break CSS for print separation.
critical_code_review_comments: getChapters() function correctly detects Hindi medium subjects using regex /[\u0900-\u097F]/ for Devanagari characters
Hindi chapters for Class 6 सामाजिक विज्ञान are properly defined in MIDDLE_SCHOOL_CHAPTERS['6_सामाजिक विज्ञान']
Answer Key div has both CSS class 'page-break-before' and inline style pageBreakBefore: 'always' for print separation
DashboardPage.js correctly uses real data from API with empty state fallback for Recent Activity

success_rate.backend: N/A (skipped per request - frontend only testing)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All reported bugs fixed. Key verifications: 1) Hindi chapters work for सामाजिक विज्ञान via isHindiMedium detection 2) Dashboard uses real API data 3) Print CSS for Answer Key separation is in place

ai_paper_page_loads.details: AI Question Paper Generator page loads correctly with RBSE (Rajasthan Board) 2024-25 Syllabus header

class_6_samajik_vigyan_hindi_chapters.details: When Class 6 + सामाजिक विज्ञान selected, Hindi chapters displayed: क्या, कब, कहाँ और कैसे?, आखेट-खाद्य संग्रह से भोजन उत्पादन तक, आरंभिक नगर, क्या बताती हैं हमें किताबें और कब्रें, राज्य, राजा और एक प्राचीन गणराज्य, etc.

exam_name_input_no_crash.details: Exam Name input can be clicked and typed into without page crash or redirect. Successfully entered 'अर्धवार्षिक परीक्षा 2024'

dashboard_real_data.details: Dashboard shows real data: 8 Total Students, 6 Total Staff, ₹0K Fee Collection, 0% Attendance. Recent Activity shows empty state 'कोई हालिया गतिविधि नहीं' (real data - no activities)

answer_key_print_separation.details: Answer Key div has page-break-before CSS class and inline style pageBreakBefore: 'always'. CSS rule in index.css: .page-break-before { page-break-before: always !important; break-before: page !important; }

boardSyllabus.js.line_751: Hindi chapters for Class 6 सामाजिक विज्ञान defined with proper Devanagari chapter names
boardSyllabus.js.line_1418: isHindiMedium detection using regex /[\u0900-\u097F]/ for Devanagari characters
boardSyllabus.js.line_1502: Special handling for Hindi medium सामाजिक विज्ञान to return Hindi chapters

DashboardPage.js.line_54: Recent activities populated from real API data (response.data.recent_activities)
DashboardPage.js.line_444: Empty state shows 'कोई हालिया गतिविधि नहीं' when no activities

AIPaperPage.js.line_849: Answer Key div has page-break-before class and inline style for print separation
